description: Dirichlet convolution of Fibonacci numbers with themselves.
links: Bruno Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..300
prog: (Maxima) a(n) := lsum(fib(d)*fib(n/d), d, listify(divisors(n)));makelist(a(n), n, 1, 40); /* _Emanuele Munarini_, Feb 14 2014 */(PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, fibonacci(d)*fibonacci(n/d)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 14 2014(MAGMA) [&+[Fibonacci(d)*Fibonacci(n div d): d in Divisors(n)]: n in [1..40]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 11 2014
author: _Erich Friedman_
